vote.title: Authorize a one-year cooperative purchasing agreement for the purchase of Infoblox, a centrally managed Domain Name System, Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol, and Internet Protocol Address space/Management solution for security monitoring and threat detection for the Department of Information and Technology Services with Netsync Network Solutions, Inc.  through the Texas Department of Information Resources cooperative agreement - Not to exceed $114,740.00 - Financing: 2023 Homeland Security-Urban Area Security Initiative 24-26 Fund
vote.description: Authorize a one-year cooperative purchasing agreement for the purchase of Infoblox, a centrally managed Domain Name System, Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol, and Internet Protocol Address space/Management solution for security monitoring and threat detection for the Department of Information and Technology Services with Netsync Network Solutions, Inc.  through the Texas Department of Information Resources cooperative agreement - Not to exceed $114,740.00 - Financing: 2023 Homeland Security-Urban Area Security Initiative 24-26 Fund
